channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Colorado teen hoping for lakeside homecoming photos shot in face by town councilman, police say
item.description: A Colorado sheriff’s office said a town councilman shot a teenager in the face Tuesday and then said “my gun went off!”

item.title: Actor Chad McQueen, son of Steve McQueen, dies at 63
item.description: Chad McQueen, an actor known for his performances in the “Karate Kid” movies and the son of the late actor and racer Steve McQueen, has died.

item.title: Alaska high court lets man serving a 20-year sentence remain in US House race
item.description: The Alaska Supreme Court has ruled that a man serving a 20-year prison sentence can remain on the ranked choice general election ballot in the race for the state’s only U.S.
